byline.contributor: Jack Ewing reported from Frankfurt, and Melissa Eddy from Weimar, Germany. Victor Homola contributed reporting from Berlin, and Rick Gladstone from New York.
byline.original: By JACK EWING and MELISSA EDDY

abstract: Elite German police unit kills man armed with rifle who took hostages at multiplex movie theater; authorities say assailant had no apparent connection to Islamist extremism.

headline.print_headline: Police in Germany Kill Man Who Attacked a Multiplex
headline.main: Police Kill Movie Theater Assailant in Germany

snippet: An assailant entered a multiplex theater in the western town of Viernheim, but the police stormed the building and killed him, officials reported.
lead_paragraph: An assailant entered a multiplex theater in the western town of Viernheim, but the police stormed the building and killed him, officials reported.
